targets.expr: sum by (name, type, cluster) (elasticsearch_thread_pool_active_count{name=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster", type!="management"})
sum by (name, type, cluster) (rate(elasticsearch_thread_pool_completed_count{name=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster", type!="management"}[$__interval_sx4]))
sum(elasticsearch_thread_pool_queue_count{name=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster", type!="management"}) by (name, cluster, type)
sum by (name, type, cluster) (rate(elasticsearch_thread_pool_rejected_count{name=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", cluster=~"$cluster", type!="management"}[$__interval_sx4]))
